Welcome to Tetsutetsu
Welcome to Tetsutetsu:
"Staten Island's most elegant sushi restaraunt"
Presented by Brian Lum
Once in a while when I wake up. I find myself crying. The dream I must have had I can never recall. But... But... the sensation that I've lost something lingers for a long time after I wake up. I'm always searching for something, for someone. This feeling has possessed me I think from that day... That day when the stars came falling. It was almost as if... as if a scene from a dream. Nothing more, nothing less than a beautiful view.
